title: QB's mentorship role; Most underrated WR's; Wilson's positive & powerful approach; QB competition in Pittsburgh
itunes:title: QB's mentorship role; Most underrated WR's; Wilson's positive & powerful approach; QB competition in Pittsburgh
description:
The Good Morning Football Podcast begins looking at the starting quarterbacks responsibility to mentor the future starting quarterback. Hosts Kay Adams, Peter Schrager, Tom Pelissero and 2-time Super Bowl champion Torrey Smith react to Ryan Tannehill’s comments about his role in mentoring Malik Willis. Then the GMFB crew dives into what they liked the most from the NFC West teams in the draft. Later, Peter and Torrey deliver their top-3 underrated receivers which includes a Buccaneers and Panthers WR as their most underrated and then Tom reacts to Russell Wilson’s positive and powering approach he’s bringing to the Denver Broncos. They finish up discussing the quarterback competition between Kenny Pickett and Mitch Trubisky in Pittsburgh.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
